review: Was looking for a good Pediatric for my son, as we recently moved to India. My search was over after meeting Dr. Uday Kumar Sahu - he listens very patiently & gives sufficient time to speak about your baby health or any concerns. We were freely interact and able to express ours queries quite easily. I would strongly recommend Dr. Uday if anyone looking for good Pediatric nearby Kondapur.  Thanks Dr. Uday
reply_text: Dear Anil, you made an impact in my practice with appreciative words. It was pleasure meeting you and your family. Stay happy and I wish you never need me

tags: None
review: Dr.Uday gave us enough time to explain and discuss my new born’s nursing problems, jaundice, vomitings etc He gave us 40 mins time to check our Boy’s health throughout and suggested good medicines which gave relief right away and also suggested preventive tips . Very helpful and helped relive our stress
reply_text: I love new born babies. This interest draws me to give my best. I am happy to hear about your baby’s relief. Enjoy your new parenthood. Stay connected for anything and everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: 1. We have visited dr.Uday Kumar Sahu for my son  having a high fever.initially we explained that to control my son's high fever during the midnight before the dr's visit, we took over the counter medication paracetamol and antibiotics which he strongly said that it is like treating our son with poison without a consultant doctor, I believe every parent will do the same around midnight.2.upon checking the fever for my son dr suggested sponge bath in the dr's office, while we are doing the sponge bath to my son Dr came in middle *** *********** he argued that we are not doing the proper way, and his expectations are that parents should know everything like a dr. 3. He doesn't have the minimum patience to explain in the proper way but he spends time which is really a no use of talking *** ******* **** *********4. Later he prescribed the medication along with a few lab tests and he strongly said that antibiotics should never be taken in this high fever case, 5. Next day we followed up with lab results, and again he started arguing that lab reports are not correct even though those are certified labs and he will not consider our lab results.and dr expected us to visit only Vijay diagnostic which he didn't told us earlier.6. He also said that he can only treat kids of  educated parents and those should know  in and out of each and every medical term  in a very detailed way. ** ***** ** ********* **** ** ****** **** ** ** ***** ** **** *** ******** ****** *** ******* ** *** *********8. upon he said that he will never consider the lab results and upon insisting he prescribed an additional medicine which is surprisingly Antibiotics, which strongly contradict his own  points from 1 and 4.9. we are supposed to buy  the medicine from his office only.*** *** **** *** ***** **** ** * ** ***** **** ****** ******* *** ***** **** ****** ********* ** *** ****** **** ******** ************* ** ******* ******* ******* ****** ** ** **** *** ** ******* ********. only for consideration dr charged us Rs. 800 and gave us receipt of rs. 700 only. ******** * ******** ** ****** **** ****** ** ***** ************** ** ******* **** *** **** *** ** ******** **** *** ********* ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
** **** ***** **** ** ** ********* ****** *** **** we have met him for my son's treatment. My Son is 3 months old,  since few days  he is not able to take milk properly and crying most of the time when i try to feed him. We visited various hospitals like Fernandez, Rainbow but none of the doctors there were able to identify the issue.

Very rarely we will see doctors spending time with patients  but Dr Uday is an exception he spent 30 mins with us and he went through each and every details of my son to get a better understanding of the issue.

Dr Uday thoroughly checked my son and confirmed my son has mild infection in the stomach which is causing him discomfort while taking milk. Dr Uday suggested few medicines for 5 days and assured us that he will take milk from the 2nd dose of medicine and to our surprise my son started taking milk from the 2nd dose of medicine. We could see lot of improvement in my son within 5 days and now my son is able to take milk without any issues.

Hatsoff to Dr Uday for his timely diagnose and treatment.
reply_text:
Hello Gouthami
It gratifies me to alleviate discomfort in babies and see  parents get relief. Thank you for your appreciation. God bless you all with good health

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Went for my new born daughter  treatment for jaundice, earlier I was treated with one of the top hospital in Hyderabad and as the new born got effected with jaundice they asked for several blood tests daily for new born and to go for phototherapy which I really disliked and preferred Dr Uday sir which he clinically tested and treated without any blood tests and medicines.And he even explained the issue and treatment.This shows his expertise *** ********* ** ************
I would strongly recommend Dr Uday sir ** ****** ******* *** **** ********** *** * **** ***** *** ******
reply_text: Thanks Kalyan. Have a joyous life with your bundle of joy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have a long association with Dr Uday Kumar Sahu, since his early days at Image hospitals. My elder daughter had breathing issues along with unexplained fever and we could get immediate relief just after the single visit. We are back in Hyderabad after 8 long years at Gurgaon and surprisingly we got to Dr Uday Kumar Sahu, not knowing he is the one. He has been extremely good at building bond with small kids and spends quality time both with the kids as well as the accompanying parent. So far, i did not feel like visiting him for review within a week. He is really good.
reply_text: Thank you Arun. It was refreshing to meet you again

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
First look ambience is pleasant and kid friendly. 
Staff good. 
Doctor is really calm, a great listener and personable. Explained everything to me in a very clear manner. Helped me to understand and wave off all the wrong notions I had in my mind. Makes sure you and him are on the same page and comfortable. He is not just somebody who would pen down list of medicines. Prescribes only if absolutely necessary.Great experience as a first timer.Couldn’t have asked for a better Paediatrician. Thank you!
reply_text:
Dear Ranveer
It is overwhelming to note that you are satisfied with my interaction. Yes, what I earn is your satisfaction. I am indebted to your feelings

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Went to this doctor after reading many positive reviews here in Practo, but in our case it turned out to be a negative one.  First of all the doctor does not take payments for vaccination through credit cards, he only accepts cash. Secondly, he started preaching the parents for not maintaining a single file for the baby with out listening or understanding out side of the story. We have recently relocated here in Hyderabad and so we have 2 files. ******** *** *** ** ******** * ** ***** *** ****** *** ****** *** **** * ************** He shouted on the baby for crying, while administering the vaccines, he asked us to hold the baby's hands and feet, he did not have any nurse or help in his chamber. Once the vaccines were given, the site was bleeding and the doctor denined us even a single piece of cotton to stop the blood. Not professional behavior **** ** *********** ************* Overall, I am never going back to Dr. Sahu again nor would I recommend any parent to do so.
reply_text: Dear Premangshu, I am sorry that you were disappointed. Sometimes ones best effort may not parallel appropriateness. I shall improve. Thanks for your feedback

review:
Visited Dr Sahu's clinic again yesterday to get treatment for my child's skin problem.  We were explained both cause and treatment method plus do's and don'ts. Came out highly satisfied.

Have been visiting Dr Sahu's clinic  for the past 13 years. Both my kids have undergone treatment for a variety of health issues. From experience, *** ****** ** ****** ************** treatment method is not harsh and can be fully trusted. ******* ********* ** the most important part in quick healing and that is what we got here every time.
reply_text: Dear Bhupathi thanks for your kind appreciation. I am indebted to you. I will always give my best

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visiting Dr.Uday sir since 17 years for my son and daughter. Today many of my family members (at-least 10 kids) visiting him for vaccinations and for treatments. My nephew for his son contacts Dr.Uday for any kind of medical issues online from Canada. 

All this years most of the times I have visited only once for one issue, he never give a chance for second visit. 

He also suggested me home remedies many times, especially for new born babies. 

It is needless to say anything more about Dr.Uday except suggesting new patients not to hesitate to visit Dr.Uday. 

We are missing Dr.Uday around Nallakunta these days, as taking kids to Kondapur from Nallakunta area when they are ill is difficult task for many. I am still visiting Dr.Uday at Sai Vani or Kondapur travelling all the way from Ramanthapur depending on the urgency.
reply_text: I am indebted to your kind words Bheem sir. In fact it made me emotional. May the kind of your tribe flourish.

tags: None
review:
Doctor was good listener. He listened our words patiently and gave us proper response. His diagnostic process was good and he is very friendly.
Though he was good in his treatment but his examples are not likely to be accepted. He was giving some nagative examples during the treatment. Parents may not like to here those words. We all know the ugly truth, no need to broadcast it to the patients. We also ask for some suggestions for baby foods but he initially avoid the question saying that he doesn't have cooking experience. Later we put the question in differently to know his viewpoint.
reply_text: Thank you Tapan for your appreciation and keenness in my professional approach. I am still learning and shall improve so that you feel comfortable

tags: None
review: We went to doctor for our child,s fever and cough. Doctor Uday diagnose the issue immediately and explained us in detail. He is really friendly and give full time and listen all the issues patiently. He prescribed antibiotics and cough syrup and that works immediately. Doctor’s analysis is really good and and he immediately figured out it is bacterial infection and needs antibiotics to treat it. I would really recommend Dr Uday for any child health issues.
reply_text: Thank you Archana for reposing trust on me. Shall always do the best

tags: None
review:
I don't know about other people but I am new to Hyderabad and new to Dr Uday kumar. 
What I don't like about the doctor is the way he talked to him and my wife.
He was insisting my wife that not to give breast milk to baby but the moment she told doctor that my baby don't want to eat or drink anything except breast milk, doctor said "aap log padhe likhe ho first listen what I am telling".
I feel this particular statement very rude, and being a doctor and that too pediatrician, this statement doesn't suit him. 
And in end of communication he asked us to give good rating on practo?
For me its worst.
reply_text: I am sorry Sumit that I failed in your expectations. I will earnestly make efforts to improve myself. I always request to give feedback but never insist on "good " or otherwise.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sahu's clinic is the best place to take your baby for any medical consultancy. He gives a personal touch during his consultations. He tells us minutely about the cure and the precautions. He doesn't recommends any unnecessary diagnostic tests. His prescribed medicines works wonders and soothes baby in no time. Best place to take ur baby for any medical condition.
reply_text: Wow! Atul you are so good with words. Thanks and God bless you

reply_text:

Thanks for patient listening. I am sure your child will continue to have great health. Home food is the best from every angle of development.

Then I understood that her treatment is not good, after lots of research I came to know about dr uday sir, we went to savithri clinic, he explained well and treated the infection. She recovered with in one day. I highly recommend this clinic for all the kids.
reply_text: There is a saying “ I treat, God heals”. Having said so, I pray God to give me knowledge to treat each child well. Thanks Samridhi for your kind words. May you enjoy good always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: I visited Dr uday for my 2.5 year old daughter. She  continuously suffers from upper respiratory infections. I was very tired from roaming doctors to doctors, when I came to him, my search ended. He not only explained everything to me, but his treatments did wonder to my child and now she doesn't use asthma pumps which every other pediatric said to use continuously till she turns 7year old.
reply_text:
Dear Sweta
You and your daughter is wonderful too. Be happy and healthy always. Thanks for your encouraging words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have visited the doctor for general checkup and for lot of queries that we had. We really appreciate the time he spent to explain all the issues/questions we had . He suggested good medications which are only required unlike others writing down unecessary medicines. Patient friendly and we are very satisfied.
reply_text: Thanks Phalguna. Each of your words encourages me to make your visit a better one

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
There was a lot of lot of communication gap. When I called the clinic, the person on the other end of phone said doctor is leaving in next 5 minutes. When I reached there, it was 3 patients waiting. I spoke with the doctor and he said — 15 mins per patient at least would take you 45 mins.

I rushed so much in order to reach, and it was of no use.

Having said that, doctor himself was good, *** ************** He did examine properly, and gave satisfying treatment.
reply_text: I am sorry Manish that you had taken all the trouble. On Saturdays due to chaotic traffic, most of the patients are unable to maintain time. This leads to many patients visiting in a short time. Despite this, I try to justify justify each child's consultation. I wish a good health to your child.

review: * ** *** **** ***** *** *** ******** ******** I visited the clinic regarding 'noisy breathing' in my 2 and half months daughter. The doctor suggested *** ** ** ** ** ******* ********* *** **** *** ******* ** *** *** ** *** to use Vicks vapour. The Vicks bottle comes with a caution which states  ' not to be used for children below 2 yrs'. Even the Vicks baby vapour rub mentions that it has to be used in children above 3 months. He also mentioned about anemic condition of child, when asked about the solution,his answer was ' we can discuss in next visit'. Not worth the money and effort.
reply_text: I wish I could emphasise on steaming. I will improve on my communication and be more useful in future

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: **** *** ** ************ ** ****** *********** ***** *** ******** I visited for my baby’s vaccination and after putting the needle into skin, he left it for 3 seconds without doing anything and he is asking ********* Is it painful?
reply_text:
Hi Sir/Madam
Waiting for few seconds after piercing with needle ensures less chances of oozing of blood after withdrawal of needle. It also ensures that needle is not inside any blood vessel. This step is for the safety of your child. Further, engaging the child in conversation is one of the methods to lessen apprehension in a child undergoing vaccination. Thanks for your guidance.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor did not give enough time to explain the issue with my one year old son. Vaccine prices were not transparent. We did not get an itemized bill which is provided elsewhere.
reply_text:
Dear parents
On the day of your appointment which was at 5:45 pm, you came at 6:25 pm. You were accommodated and seen from 7:09 pm to 7:24 pm; a total of 15 minutes,which is the standard norm of clinic according to Ptacto. A through examination was done and vaccinations were given after finding no medical contraindications . On your previous visit you had encouragingly commented in my visitor book " patient hearing good diagnosis". I appreciate your gesture. In this clinic the vaccines are dispensed and not sold, so you got a total receipt. If you have any doubt, you can verify the rate on internet. I apologise for not coming upto your expectation. I shall improve.
